page.title: 07Marston, Village Life
page.content: This large village has 2 chapels, an Anglican church and a Roman Catholic Church.It is well served by shops and has a modern parade of local shops.There are 2 butchers, a newsagent, a post office ,a grocers and 2 hairdressers and a petrol station.The area is served by 3 milkmen and has a residential policeman (shared eith Cranfield). There is a Doctor's surgery on 2 days a week and a mobile library calls fortnightly. There are Bus routes to Bedford, Milton Keynes and a Motorway Express srevice from Cranfield to London via Marston Moretaine.
